scripts.start: npm run client:build && npm run server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.seed: cd server && npm run build && npm run seed
scripts.brain: cd server && npm run build && npm run seed
